p: The yield of L. angustifolia leaves EO was 0.45%v/w. The four major components of the L. angustifolia EO were eucalyptol (52.362%), camphor (11.915%), gamma-terpinene (8.775%) and endoborneol (7.585%) ( Figure 1). The result from GC-MS analysis revealed that 63 components in the oil and 12 of them were identified representing 98.401% of the total composition ( Table 1).
